data: Day was dawning when Don Quixote quitted the inn, so happy, so gay, so exhilarated at finding himself now dubbed a knight, that his joy was like to burst his horse-girths.
The History of Don Quixote, Volume 1, Part 02
Cervantes Saavedra, Miguel de, 1547-1616; Dor√©, Gustave, 1832-1883 [Illustrator]; Ormsby, John, 1829-1895 [Translator]
